targets.expr:
sum(
  (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!=""}[5m])
  * on(pod) group_left(created_by_name, created_by_kind) 
  kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
) by (created_by_name, created_by_kind)

sum( 
(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!=""} * on(pod, namespace) group_left(created_by_name,created_by_kind) kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})) by (created_by_name,created_by_kind)

(
  sum(
    label_replace(
      kube_pod_status_ready{namespace="$namespace", condition="true"} 
      * on(pod) group_left(created_by_name) 
      kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"},
      "deployment_name",
      "$1",
      "created_by_name", 
      "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+"
    )
  ) by (deployment_name)
  / 
  sum(
    label_replace(
      kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"},
      "deployment_name",
      "$1",
      "created_by_name", 
      "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+"
    )
  ) by (deployment_name)
)
